extension.description: Here you will find all your XBMC related video guides. Please note this is a collection of self-help XBMC guides provided by various members of the community so a big thank you goes out to everyone involved. TotalXBMC.tv take no responsibility for the content of these videos, they are all freely available via youtube - we've simply asked the uploaders permission to add them to our playlist so you have everything XBMC related in one easy to find place.
